items.title: AI-Powered Product Recommendation Engine
items.description: Implement an AI-based system to provide personalized product recommendations to users based on browsing and purchase history.
acceptance_criteria: System displays at least 5 relevant product recommendations on the homepage for logged-in users.
Recommendations update dynamically based on recent user activity within 24 hours.
Recommendation click-through rate can be tracked and reported.
non_functional: Recommendations must load within 2 seconds on average.
System must handle up to 10,000 concurrent users without degradation.

notes: Assumed that the platform already has a product catalog and user account system; requirement focuses on integrating AI recommendations.
